text: Fabrizio Adriano Frizzi (5 February 1958 – 26 March 2018) was an Italian television presenter. He was best known for presenting a number of Rai-based television shows such as L'eredità, Scommettiamo che...? and the Italian version of Identity. He was also an occasional voice actor, giving his voice to Woody in the Italian broadcasts of the Toy Story films and other media. On 26 March 2018, Frizzi died following a cerebral hemorrhage, aged 60. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1958 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Actors from Rome Category:Italian television presenters Category:Italian voice actors Category:Deaths from cerebral hemorrhage
title: Fabrizio Frizzi
